# isAntialiased

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to apply antialiasing to the edges of a shape.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAntialiased: Bool
```

## Setting fill style properties

- **isEOFilled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use the even-odd rule when rendering a shape.
